content.question: Muslim maritime activities in the Indian Ocean would be most disrupted by which of the following sixteenth-century developments?

choices.label: The voyages of Chinese treasure fleets led by Zheng He
The arrival of Portuguese and other Europeans
The growth of the African slave trade

content.answer: The arrival of Portuguese and other Europeans
